xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes to Financial Results: 1. Net Worth as at 31st December, 2022 is Rs. 686,440 Crore. 2. Outstanding Capital Redemption Reserve/Debenture Redemption Reserve as at 31st December, 2022 is Rs. 2,269 Crore. 3. Further, the following ratios which form part of the Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022, are reproduced below, as there are no rows designated for the same in the XBRL format: Ratio Quarter ended Nine Months ended 31st December, 2022 31st December, 2022 A) Current ratio 0.95 0.95 B) Long Term Debt to Working Capital 5.96 5.96 C) Bad Debts to Account Receivable Ratio 0.00 0.00 D) Current Liability Ratio 0.50 0.50 E) Total Debt to Total Assets 0.18 0.18 F) Debtors Turnover Ratio $ 36.78 39.16 G) Inventory Turnover Ratio $ 6.14 7.29 H) Operating Margin (%) 10.4 10.2 I) Net Profit Margin (%) * 7.4 7.2 $ Ratios for the quarter/nine months have been annualised. * Includes Exceptional Items
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. Q3 FY23 Segment Revenue includes Rs 20,371 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 220,592 crore. 2. 9M FY23 Segment Revenue includes Rs 60,874 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 676,568 crore. 3. Oil to Chemicals (O2C), Retail and Financial Services Segment results includes Interest income / Other Income pertaining to the respective segments. 4. Segment assets and liabilities have been grossed up, with respect to advance from customers, bill discounting, other non-current assets and short term provisions whereas the same are netted off in the respective heads of Balance Sheet.
